General.Name: Rafael Microelectronics
General.Description: Rafael Microelectronics, Inc. engages in the research and development, design, manufacturing, and marketing of radio frequency (RF) integrated circuits, integrated RF systems, and related products. It offers IoT connectivity products; optical networking products, including trans-impedance amplifiers and laser drivers; satellite communication products; terrestrial/cable/satellite set-top box receivers; and TV receivers, such as single, dual-standard, double digital, and analog/digital tuners. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3.Name: Anita  Yen
3.Title: CFO, Corp. Governance Officer & Director of Admin. Department
